author: etan_status
content:
Have rebased on v1.7.0-a.0 which seems to include such changes, any further blockers or okay to proceed with 7688 progressivelist changes?
- https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/4630

author: __flcl
content: Suppose I want to analyze SSZ data that comes from RPC as binary stream and need human readable form of it. Is there any format for schema that RPC can provide along with the data?

author: etan_status
content: SSZ does not currently define a transmissible schema, and also uses consensus-fork-specific data structures

author: etan_status
content: i.e., client needs to know what to expect. server only tells them the consensus-fork that's being used (via HTTP header)

author: etan_status
content: From ACDC discussion, CFI non-headliners (e.g., 7688) can be merged after the headliner (ePBS) is stable on devnets. Will keep rebasing it until that is the case.
